page.title: 08NEWLANDS FARM
page.content: The area is very flat, consisting mainly of arable farmland. Crops that have been grown are wheat, barley and oil seed rape. .all the fields are bordered by well-established hedges, mostly of hawthorn, with some larger deciduous trees. There is one farm in the area, called Newlands Farm. It has a mixture of arable land and pasture land. There were beef cattle grazing in some of the fields. There is a small area of deciduous woodland in the south-west corner of the area. The woodland area is bordered by a footpath which joins the track leading to Newlands Farm. The area is crossed by electric pylons.
